description: This file defines a custom theme class 'OceanTheme' for a Flutter application, including color palette, theme construction method, and some helper widgets for header gradients.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A theme class providing a custom Ocean-inspired design for Flutter apps, including color definitions, theme builder, and gradient header widget.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object with Ocean style customization, including colors, card shapes, button styles, and app bar theme.

methods.name: gradientHeader
methods.description: Returns a widget that overlays a linear gradient background over its child, useful for headers and appbars.
